properties.auth_type: JWT Bearer token in Authorization header

concepts.name: Event
concepts.description: A scheduled calendar entry with a time range

properties.reminder_format: array of integer minutes before event start (e.g., [5, 15, 60])

concepts.name: Relative Date Resolution
concepts.description: Converting natural language dates like 'tomorrow' or 'next Friday' to ISO 8601

properties.pattern: Get current datetime first, then calculate offset

concepts.description: Tools the agent can call in ACT steps
